wedo_instance.title: WeDo Template: Article Boilerplate Schema
wedo_instance.description: Narrative-driven structure for articles within the Metagit environment. Focuses on 'Digital DNA' and 'Metabolic Growth'.

rules.narrative_aesthetic: Write for a broader audience than reports. Use evocative language while maintaining technical precision. No triple-backtick wrappers. Use clear headers and bolding.
rules.sparse_formatting: Granular Idea Isolation. Break the paragraph at every shift in focus, even within the same theme. 1 Idea = 1 Paragraph.
rules.iteration_mandate: Each subsequent draft MUST have a higher word count than the previous version.
rules.storage_protocol: Store drafts in md/context/ with timestamped filenames; store final versions in root md/ with descriptive names.
